mapper.select: select a.sto_num,sto_name,rev_rated,cm_goal_people,sto_add1||sto_add2 address, sto_phone,cm_delivery_time,cm_close from store_tb a left join common_tb b on a.sto_num = b.sto_num left join (select cm_num, round(avg(rev_rated),1) rev_rated from review_tb group by cm_num) c on b.cm_num =c.cm_num where cm_delivery_time >= #{deleveryTime} and sto_add1||sto_add2 like #{juso};
